NAME: Baby Fire Tethyr
EFFECT1: Until your next turn, all aquatic cards you control become rank 2.
EFFECT2: You can rank up this card using a water card.

NAME: Inklash
EFFECT1: Add one aquatic card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: This card gains 300 attack for every fire card underneath it.

NAME: Baby Kikotadu
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 2 aquatic cards from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 2 aquatic cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Tiko
EFFECT1: Add one rank 3 spellcaster card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 4 or higher spellcaster cards from your discard pile to your hand.

NAME: Turtle-E
EFFECT1: Swap one machine card you control with one machine card from your discard pile.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 1 machine cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Turtlenaught
EFFECT1: Discard this card to add one rank 2 or higher machine card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 3 or lower machine card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Turtonka
EFFECT1: Until your next turn, all beast cards you control become rank 2.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 2 or higher machine card from your discard pile to your hand.

NAME: Winged Furrorat
EFFECT1: Add one rank 2 beast card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add one rank 1 beast card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Ember Flipfish
EFFECT1: When a aquatic card is destroyed, gain one point.
EFFECT2: Discard one aquatic card to counter the effect of a rank 2 unit card.

NAME: Molten Turtle Beast
EFFECT1: This turn, all reptile cards gain 200 attack.
EFFECT2: Whenever a reptile card you control is attacked, you may redirect the attack to this card.

NAME: Selamantio Phoenix
EFFECT1: Discard this card to add one rank 3 avian card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Skip your next turn to destroy all spell cards on the field.

NAME: Pufflim
EFFECT1: This turn, change one elemental card to any other subtype.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 2 or higher elemental cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Molticrab
EFFECT1: Add up to two aquatic cards from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: This turn, all aquatic cards gain 300 attack.

NAME: Lavaclaw
EFFECT1: Add up to four rank 2 aquatic cards from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: While this card is under another, all water cards you control gain 300 attack.

NAME: Flagon Fly
EFFECT1: Add one rank 1 avian card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: You can play one extra insect card this turn.

NAME: Moist Fireboi
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 3 or lower aquatic cards from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add one rank 3 aquatic card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Aquaflamier
EFFECT1: Lose four points to untap up to four water cards you control.
EFFECT2: Discard one aquatic card to add one aquatic card from your discard pile to your hand.

NAME: Diaphin Firefish
EFFECT1: Discard one aquatic card to counter the effect of a rank 3 unit card.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, aquatic cards cannot be targeted by effects.

NAME: Flame Scorpid
EFFECT1: Both players lose one point for each reptile card they control.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 1 reptile cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Flimflip
EFFECT1: Discard this card to add one elemental card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 1 elemental cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Hogmoid
EFFECT1: Return one elemental card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Both players gain two points for each elemental card they control.

NAME: Smorkle
EFFECT1: Discard this card to add one rank 2 machine card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Destroy two machine cards you own to play one machine card from your discard pile.

NAME: Magmotus Gargatua
EFFECT1: Both players gain four points for each machine card they control.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 4 or lower reptile card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Slow Runner
EFFECT1: While this card is under another, all machine cards you control gain 50 defense.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 2 or lower machine card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Lil Flameblaster
EFFECT1: Destroy one rank 1 reptile card you own to play one rank 2 reptile card from your deck.
EFFECT2: Whenever a reptile card is played, shuffle one card from your discard pile into your deck.

NAME: Flixxik
EFFECT1: You can rank up one of your elemental card using a unit from your deck.
EFFECT2: While this card is under another, all elemental cards you control gain 100 attack.

NAME: Demogra
EFFECT1: Copy the effect of one undead card in your discard pile.
EFFECT2: This turn, all warrior cards gain 400 attack.

NAME: Gharlin
EFFECT1: Discard this card to add one rank 2 elemental card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Whenever your opponent plays a elemental card, they lose one point and you gain one point.

NAME: Influxie
EFFECT1: Both players gain one point for each beast card they control.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 2 or higher beast card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Majestic Fire Wolf
EFFECT1: While this card is on the field, all beast cards gain 200 attack.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 2 or lower beast cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Magma Falls
EFFECT1: Your opponent cannot play fire cards next turn.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, water cards can rank up using fire cards.

NAME: Peace By Fire
EFFECT1: Add one rank 2 fire card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Reveal the top two cards of your deck and play one fire card from among them.

NAME: Quantum Crystal Spark
EFFECT1: Destroy one rank 2 fire card you own to play one rank 5 fire card from your deck.
EFFECT2: Add up to three rank 2 fire cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Spell Malfunction
EFFECT1: Return one spell card from the field to the owner's deck.
EFFECT2: Destroy exactly two rank 2 spell cards on the field.

NAME: Ember Summoning Circle
EFFECT1: Destroy one rank 2 fire card you own to play one rank 4 fire card from your deck.
EFFECT2: Destroy one rank 2 fire card you own to play one rank 2 fire card from your deck.

NAME: Volcanic Summoner's Circle
EFFECT1: Discard one rank 1 unit card to play one rank 1 unit card from your deck.
EFFECT2: You can play one extra fire card this turn.

NAME: Whirling Of Flame And Fluid
EFFECT1: While this card is on the field, water cards can rank up using fire cards.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, fire cards can rank up using water cards.

NAME: Slagmoi
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 2 beast cards from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: This turn, increase the rank of one elemental card you control by one.

NAME: Flame Drop
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 1 elemental cards from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Add one rank 2 elemental card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Flame Knight, Leander
EFFECT1: Until your next turn, all warrior cards you control become rank 4.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, warrior cards cannot be targeted by effects.

NAME: Fire Tail Scorpid
EFFECT1: While this card is under another, all insect cards you control gain 100 attack.
EFFECT2: You can rank up this card using a insect card.
